description: This file defines a React component for the cart page of an e-commerce platform. It manages cart state, syncs with server data, and provides UI for viewing, updating, removing, and clearing items, as well as proceeding to checkout.

methods.name: CartPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the cart page with functionalities such as fetching cart data, updating quantities, removing items, and checkout navigation.

methods.name: handleUpdate
methods.description: Updates item quantity locally and syncs with server.

methods.name: handleRemove
methods.description: Removes item from cart both locally and on the server.

methods.name: handleClear
methods.description: Clears the cart locally and on the server.
